verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> unto me: and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H3619>basket<s%> of summer <S%H7019>fruit.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5986>Amos,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> A <S%H3619>basket<s%> of summer <S%H7019>fruit.<s%> Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, The <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> pass <S%H5674>by<s%> them any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

And the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> shall be <S%H3213>howlings<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> there shall be <S%H7227>many<s%> dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> they shall cast them <S%H7993>forth<s%> with <S%H2013>silence.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> O ye that swallow <S%H7602>up<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> even to make the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7673>fail,<s%>

Saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> will the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> be <S%H5674>gone,<s%> that we may <S%H7666>sell<s%> <S%H7668>corn?<s%> and the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> that we may set <S%H6605>forth<s%> <S%H1250>wheat,<s%> making the ephah <S%H6994>small,<s%> <S%H374><s%> and the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> <S%H1431>great,<s%> and <S%H5791>falsifying<s%> the <S%H3976>balances<s%> by <S%H4820>deceit?<s%>

That we may <S%H7069>buy<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H5668>for<s%> a pair of <S%H5275>shoes;<s%> yea, and <S%H7666>sell<s%> the <S%H4651>refuse<s%> of the <S%H1250>wheat?<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> I will <S%H5331>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H4639>works.<s%>

Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7264>tremble<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein? and it shall rise <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3605>wholly<s%> as a <S%H2975>flood;<s%> and it shall be cast <S%H1644>out<s%> and <S%H8257>drowned,<s%> as by the <S%H2975>flood<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> that I will cause the <S%H8121>sun<s%> to go <S%H935>down<s%> at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and I will <S%H2821>darken<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H216>clear<s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And I will <S%H2015>turn<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts<s%> into <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7892>songs<s%> into <S%H7015>lamentation;<s%> and I will bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it as the <S%H60>mourning<s%> of an <S%H3173>only<s%> son, and the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof as a <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> a <S%H6772>thirst<s%> for <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> of <S%H8085>hearing<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And they shall <S%H5128>wander<s%> from <S%H4480>sea<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H4217>east,<s%> they shall run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> it.
In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5968>faint<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

They that <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H819>sin<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thy <S%H430>god,<s%> O <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H2416>liveth;<s%> and, The <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H2416>liveth;<s%> even they shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>
